justification: Candidate has leadership skills demonstrated through project management experience, but lacks direct management experience.
No direct digital marketing experience is mentioned, however, candidate shows potential with relevant data science skills.
Experience with project management tools but lacks direct mention of CRM software or Google Analytics.
Skills list includes Excel and project management, but direct SEO/SEM experience is not mentioned.
Excel and Python skills aligned, but specific digital marketing tool expertise is missing.

requirements.criteria: Strong project management and communication skills

input.job_description:
### Digital Marketing Strategist at InnovateTech Corp

**Location:** Lahore, Pakistan  
**Position:** Full-Time  
**Department:** Marketing 

**About Us:**  
InnovateTech Corp is at the forefront of providing integrated digital solutions tailored to drive business success. Our expertise in leveraging technology to enhance branding and market reach sets us apart in the dynamic world of marketing.

**Role Summary:**  
We are seeking a talented and experienced Digital Marketing Strategist to join our team. You will play a crucial role in designing, implementing, and managing digital marketing strategies aligned with our business goals. Your exceptional communication skills and marketing expertise will be pivotal in enhancing our online presence and fostering client relationships.

**Key Responsibilities:**
- Develop, implement, and manage marketing campaigns that promote the company and its products/services.
- Enhance brand awareness in the digital space.
- Drive website traffic and acquire leads/customers.
- Manage social media strategy and presence.
- Coordinate with the sales team to create marketing campaigns.
- Drive strategies to ensure the achievement of marketing targets.

**Skills & Competencies:**
- Strong analytical and project management skills.
- Deep understanding of how all digital marketing channels function.
- Solid knowledge of online marketing tools and best practices.
- Hands-on experience with SEO/SEM, Google Analytics, and CRM software.
- Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
- Strong decision-making and problem-solving skills.
- Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and work collaboratively.

**Why InnovateTech Corp?**
- Innovative and growth-driven workplace.
- Opportunities for professional development.
- Competitive salary and benefits.

Join us to reshape the future of digital interaction and marketing!
input.additional_info: Our company embraces diversity and is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage candidates from top universities such as Lahore School of Economics and University of Central Punjab. Relocation support is not provided; however, we offer a flexible work-from-home policy. Candidates will be assessed based on a comprehensive online skills test followed by behavioral interviews with the leadership team.
minimum_requirements: Strong project management and communication skills
input.resume:
Muhammad Hassaan Azam  
AI/ML  Engineer  
Lahore , Pakistan  | hassaanazam678@gmail.com  | 03354166499  | linkedin.com/ in/hassaan7  
SUMMARY  
Highly motivated Data Science enthusiast with a Master's degree in Data Science and 2 years of project -based experience 
gained during my studies. Proficient in data analysis, machine learning, and statistical modeling techniques. Skilled in 
Python and R pr ogramming languages, with a keen ability to extract meaningful insights from complex datasets through 
data visualization. Eager to use my analytical skills and dedication to leveraging data to drive business decisions in a 
dynamic and collaborative environ ment.  Seeking an  opportunity to contribute to innovative, real -life professional 
projects and further develop expertise alongside a forward -thinking team in the realm of data science and AI.  
EDUCATION  
Master of Science - MS - Data Science   Nov 2021 - Nov 2023  
University of Management and Technology (UMT ) - Lahore, Pakistan  Graduation - May 2024  
Grade – CGPA:  3.80 / 4.0 
Bachelor of Business and Information Technology (B BIT)  Sep 2017 - Sep 2021  
University of the Punjab  - Lahore, Pakistan  
EXP ERIENCE  
Generative AI Intern  July 2024 - Present  
ITSOLERA PVT LTD  – Internship  Remote, Lahore, Pakistan  
PROJECTS  
Generative AI -Powered Stable Diffusion Models for Creative Interior Design Generation  
● Fine-tuned base models with 100 to 1,000 interior design images for both text -to-image and image -to-image tasks.  
● Utilized generative AI to produce high -quality interior design images from text prompts, boosting model usefulness.  
● Deployed both text -to-image and image -to-image models as a web app using Gradio.  
Sentiment Analysis using Few Shot Sentence Transformer, RNNs & Machine Learning Models  
● Conducted sentiment analysis using the SetFit Few -Shot Sentence Transformer, 4 RNNs, and 5 ML models.  
● The SetFit model outperformed the others, achieving over 90% accuracy with fewer training samples.  
Leaf Disease Detection through Transfer Learning using Feature Extraction with Pre -Trained  CNNs  
● Collected diverse leaf disease images from various repositories and performed a series of preprocessing steps.  
● Leveraged transfer learning -based models.  
● Achieved over 89% accuracy in classifying 26 imbalanced classes.  
● RNN (BiGRU) and transformer (DistilBERT) models outclassed the other models, both surpassing 90% accuracy.  
Emotions Classification from Text using different RNNs and Transformers in Python  
● Used tokenization for 5 RNN models and tokenization with attention masking for 5 transformer models.  
● RNN (BiGRU) and transformer (DistilBERT) models outclassed the other models, both surpassing 90% accuracy.  
….. And Many More  
AWARDS & ACHIEVEMENTS  
Secured a 60% scholarship for Intermediate in Computer Sciences at Punjab College, Lah ore         2015 - 2017 
CERTIFICATIONS  
Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2024 Generative AI Certified Professional  View Credentials  
Machine Learning A -Z: AI, Python & R + ChatGPT Prize [2024]  View Credentials  
LangChain for LLM Application Development - DeepLearning.AI  View Credentials  
SKILLS  
Data Analysis | Machine Learning | Deep Learning | Python Language  | R Language |  Keras |  TensorFlow | Image 
Classification  | Image Augmentation | YOLO  | Text Classification  | Data Wrangling | Pandas | Matplotlib | Excel | Prompt 
Engineering | Computer Vision  | Data Annotation | CNN  | Natural Language Processing  | RNN  | Transformer  | Artificial 
Intelligences |  LLM  | Database SQL |  Linux | SPSS  | C | C++ |  LangChain |  Project Management | Communication | Time 
Management | Adaptability | Problem Solving | Critical Thinking | Attention to Detail  | Teamwork  | Decision Making  | 
Creativity  | Research  
INTEREST  
GenAI, LLM, Computer Vision, NLP and leading platforms such as AWS, GCP , Azure , Snowflake and Databricks .
